sentences.en: After that you may pass by , inasmuch you have come to your servant.
sentences.cn: 你们既到仆人这里来, 理当如此.

sentences.en: Forgive them inasmuch as they are young.
sentences.cn: 原谅他们吧，因为他们还年轻。

sentences.en: He is a Dane inasmuch as he was born in Denmark.
sentences.cn: 他按出生在丹麦来说是丹麦人.

sentences.en: He was a very unusual musician inasmuch as he was totally deaf.
sentences.cn: 他是完全失聪的，从这点上来说，他是个很了不起的音乐家。

sentences.en: His duty is to assist the aggrieved person inasmuch as he is able.
sentences.cn: 他的责任是尽他所能帮助受冤屈的人.

sentences.en: I inasmuch as as he is an honest man, I think you may rely upon him.
sentences.cn: 鉴于他为人诚实, 我想你可以信赖他.

sentences.en: Inasmuch as the waves are high, I shall not go out in the boat.
sentences.cn: 既然风浪很大, 我就不乘船出海了.

sentences.en: Inasmuch as we serve the people , we are not afraid to have our shortcomings pointed out.
sentences.cn: inasmuchas表示明显的理由或条件, 是最为正式和语气最强的用语,表示“因为”的意思.

sentences.en: Inasmuch as you are their parents, you are responsible for the behaviour of these kids.
sentences.cn: 因为你们是这几个孩子的父母, 你们就得对他们的行为负责.

sentences.en: Salvation is inasmuch as it entails deliverance from judgment to final glorification.
sentences.cn: 救恩是末世性的,由于它讲到从审判中被拯救,进入最后的荣耀里.

sentences.en: They are almost unique inasmuch as scarcely any parallels to them can be found elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 与同类作品相比,它们有独到之处,在其他地方几乎很少见到这些特点鲜明的传说与神话.

sentences.en: This was a good decision inasmuch as it worked for you.
sentences.cn: 既然对你起作用，这就是个明智的决定。

sentences.en: Tim head start in the race, inasmuch as he was smaller than the others.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆因为个儿比其他所有人小, 所以比赛让他先跑.

sentences.en: What he said is true, inasmuch as as I know it.
sentences.cn: 就我所知,他说的都是真的.
